column4: how do i change my hostname in ubuntu ?? cuz when i go to my terminal it sez jesson@jesson shouldnt it be jesson@mynameserver/or ipadd ???? help pls
ok cuz when i tried to install danter server it sez in the terminal that i had no internal address
there are multiple ways. Did you try google? Be careful though. It can upser certain things which think they know your hostname.
